title: Analyze Opponent's Brief for Key Arguments
description: An attorney needs to analyze an opponent's motion brief to identify their key legal arguments in order to draft a response.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the full text of the document.

tasks.description: Identify the main headings and subheadings to understand the structure of their argument.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates an outline of the opponent's brief.

tasks.description: For each section, summarize the core legal argument being made and the key cases they rely on.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a summary that will serve as the basis for drafting a reply brief.
